com.mygdx.game.ui

Class UIShop.ShopItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.ui.UIComponent
      • com.mygdx.game.ui.UIShop.ShopItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UIShop.ConsumableShopItem, UIShop.EquipmentShopItem
    Enclosing class:
    UIShop

    private abstract class UIShop.ShopItem
extends UIComponent
    Represents an item listed in the shop.
